Package: uniandes.unacloud.web.services

[Groovy] Class UserService

    • uniandes.unacloud.web.services.UserService

    • This service contains all methods to manage User: User crud methods, change password, validate login, and changes api key. This class connects with database using hibernate

      Authors:
      CesarF
